results.abstract: Known as an annular eclipse, it occurs when the moon moves in between the sun and the Earth but is too far to completely block the sun as it would during a total solar eclipse.

media.caption: An annular solar eclipse as seen in Utah in May 2012. A similar “ring of fire” eclipse will be visible in the southern hemisphere on Sunday.

results.title: ‘Ring of Fire’ Solar Eclipse Will Cross Southern Hemisphere on Sunday
